titles.title: Commending Miller Motorsports Park, the county of Tooele, and the State of Utah for hosting the Federation Internationale de Motocyclisme (FIM) Superbike World Championship May 29 through June 1, 2008.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
4/17/2008--Introduced. Salutes the riders and teams that compete at a professional, world-class level in the Federation Internationale de Motocyclisme (FIM) Superbike World Championship.
Congratulates Miller Motorsports Park, Tooele county, and the state of Utah for hosting the Championship.
